reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck shirt conforms nicely to the figure and is well-made, with a soft, luxurious feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up one size!
items.body: This is such a nice sweater; it's soft and cozy, feels very silky against the skin. I sized up one, because they say it fits snugly, and I'm so glad I did. It's definitely a fitted top, but wearing it in a medium means it just skims my figure really nicely, without looking like I've been poured into it. I got it in the coffee color, which is a beautiful, rich color. The turtle neck is also a nice fit; not snug, so I don't feel like I'm being choked. It's solidly 4-6'" too long for my petite (5'2") frame, so I won't be able to wear it untucked, but that's okay. The fabric is of light-to-medium weight; thin enough to be able to tuck it in, and it will be fine. I so love the quality of this sweater, that I wish it was available in a petite, so I could buy more colors. All that being said, I have no regrets for purchasing this soft, classy turtleneck. Read more
items.author: Brenda Lee Lou

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fitted turtleneck!
items.body: This turtleneck is exactly what I was looking for. Itâ€™s fitted but still comfortable, with a ton of stretch. The material is soft, not see-through, and it layers beautifully under jackets, flannels, and sweaters without feeling bulky. Itâ€™s super versatile â€” you can dress it up with jewelry or keep it casual. Iâ€™ve already worn it multiple times, and it holds its shape after washing. Definitely a wardrobe staple! Read more
items.author: Destiny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, Good Fit, Thick Material
items.body: I was a bit skeptical paying so much for a shirt, but figured it would be an investment if it was nice. And it is nice! The material is fairly thick, the color is truly black, and it did not shrink in the wash. It was warm, but not too warm to wear inside. It could be a layering piece depending on where you live. The sleeves were a tad short for my preference (I have freakishly long arms), but they still hit at my wrist. I wore it tucked in with slacks and it was long enough to tuck in and did not move, it is also tight enough that it did not bulge weirdly when tucked in. The turtle neck aspect was longer than I have had in the past, but once I got it situated it was comfortable and did not move all day. I recommend this if you are looking for a basic turtle neck! I will be purchasing in other colors. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit see through but fit it is good, fabric is soft.
items.body: 5'2", 130lbs, and I'm a bit petite so turtle necks are always a bit bulky on my neck, but it fit better than I expected. The fabric is unfortunately a bit see through which is frustrating. Why is it so hard to find white sweaters that aren't see through?? Out of the packaging there are little bumps at the shoulders but I'm hoping that washes out. Very warm on the neck but breathable fabric. Very soft also and feels like good quality for the price. This was on sale for $22 so I thought id give it a shot. I like it ðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Product
items.body: Pretty Basic Turtleneck Sweater !!!! I Like The Baby Pink Color Looks Exactly AS In The Picture, It Is A Basic Classic Turtleneck Sweater But Looks Beautiful On, I Love The Ribbed Knit Material Is Nice And Soft, Size Medium Fits Me Very Good I Like The Slim Fit Of It And The Length Too, Just One Thing That Arrived Very Wrinkle Because Had Been Compressed Very Tight Into The Plastic Bag, I Hope I Will Be Able To Take Those Wrinkles Out Ironing And Steamed It Well, Thank You For The Nice Early Delivered !!!!. Read more
items.author: Estela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit.
items.body: The product is of good quality, and the size is precisely what is shown on Amazon. Read more
items.author: Big Bird

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: I am a size medium but bought a large because reviews said its a slim fit. I am glad i fid because it fits skimming my body without ot being tight or baggy. I would definitely size up. I got the burgundy and it was light burgundy not very deep. Read more
items.author: Jacquie Lamattina

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Brown is light
items.body: I didn't bother trying this turtleneck on because the brown is pretty light and I needed a true darker brown to go with a cardigan I already have. I don't think the color is true as shown online, as compared to another brand that was true to the color. Read more
items.author: Paul Phillips

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Pink, White, Oats, Toffee, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Taro, Dustypink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
